name: Rio from the mountains
description: The special thing about my trip is the feeling that you are exploring places in Rio that is very hard to go with public transportation and I want to give to you a perspective of a true local, who can explaine everything you want about life in Rio, our culture and our preferences. We are going to spots that people from Rio goes, not places just for tourists.At Rio from the mountains, we are going to hike in 2 of the most amazing views that you ever seen. Both are really easy less than 1 hour hike untill the top. We can go in your time, dont need to rush. At one of them, we will pass by a peacefull Favela, so also you get a Favela experience inside our trip.
